OOC:  Sorry I was confused, Perceptor is with the medics and Nightlight.

IC:

"Tell me when the program started to run"said dryly perceptor"It isnt be
easy, we must try to remove first Predacon one; is this program designed to
delete both programs?"





-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 2010 11:12 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening

Legacy and Santon continued thier scan of Nightlight, the lights by
her bed giving a rough approximation of what was going on in her
interior.

"Interesting." Legacy said as he watched, his voice utterly calm and
controlled. "Her physical reactions are sedated but there is still
activity in there."

Santon pointed at another screen, "That is in reaction to the conflict
between her two programs inside her." The Maximal medic frowned, "None
of us were designed to operate with two fully functioning personality
matrices."

"Confirmed." Legacy said as he watched his screen. "My screen also
shows a similar response patturn."

"What are we going to so now?" Bump, the third medically trained
Maximal said as he walked up to examine the screens.

"Matrix deletion." Legacy said in cold tones.

Santon standing beside him nodded in agreement. "Perceptor was right."

Bump walked over to another panel and began programing in a few
commands. "This is going to take a moment, it is not every day that we
attempt to delete personality profiles from a Spark." Bump frowned in
concentration, "Sparks are designed to resist exactly what we are
trying to do."

Legacy moved over to Bump's station, "I will assist." he said as he
too began entering  commands. In the screen above them a program was
swiftly being built. One created with a singular function: Delete
Nightlight's personality programs.

OOC: Did Perceptor stay in the room with Nightlight and the medics or
did he leave with the others?

(TAG)

Preston

> Rodimus shook his head slighly as he turned to leave the room, his
> strides long and purposeful. "There are so many things to deal with at
> once." He said as he walked, his face firm and resolute. "At them
> moment we have our two objectives, locating and defeating Hydras as
> well as learning more information about the Insect creatures that we
> have just encountered."
>
> Rodimus turned and looked at the others that had followed him out of
> the room. He gestured expansively with his his left hand as he
> continued to hold Elita in his right arm. They had all come to a stop
> in a large chamber, the bridge was just a litle ahead of them. Cheetor
> and Lord Elder also made thier way over to joim the group.
>
> "Tuscon, since you are a Prime now and I am sure you are eager to
> revisit yourself on Hydras, whoch will leave me to focus on the
> insectoids." Rodimus smiled grimly as he tapped his head meaningfully.
> "I believe that even though they have been able to learn much of us
> Maximals and Autobots from what was stored in my head, I believe that
> they left a few tid bits in my head as well."
